message.content:
Reinforcement Learning, Theory. 

Reinforcement learning is present in the paper as the control law is constructed by solving a two player zero sum differential game on a moving horizon, which is a common approach in reinforcement learning. 

Theory is also present in the paper as it provides conditions under which the controller results in a stable system and satisfies an infinite horizon H 1 norm bound. The paper also uses a risk sensitive formulation to provide a state estimator in the observation feedback case, which is a theoretical approach.
